content.text: Hi I'm a student, I like to read pet training blogs and websites.
Hi I'm a stay at home mom, I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family but I try my best because I love them.
What's your favorite thing about being a stay at home mom?
I love spending time with my son.
Aww, that sounds so sweet. What do you do with him?
We play games, go to the park, and I read him stories.
That's so cute. What kind of games do you play?
We play board games, card games, and we also play outside.
That sounds like so much fun. I wish I had a kid to play with.
You can always volunteer at your local child care center or homeless shelter.
That's a great idea, I'll look into that.
I'm sure you'll be great with kids
